title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Materials to Loan
body: Materials to Loan      Currently, the park is reassessing our materials that are loaned to education groups. The traveling trunk program is being revamped and should be available by early 2014. The park is also securing the rights to various video movies about the Klondike Gold Rush and will published a list of materials available as soon as possible.        Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park Days of Adventure; Dreams of Gold    A video detailing the trails and tribulations of those headed to the Klondike Gold Rush. This 27 minute video narrated by Hal Holbrook explores all the facets of the gold rush from the ports of Skagway and Dyea, along the Chilkoot and Whitepass Trails, down the Yukon River, and finally in the gold fields surrounding Dawson City.    Type:Media For Loan
